item.title: $8.33/mo Small Business & Residential VoIP
item.description: Forget expensive phone plans advertised on TV, there’s a better option for homes and small businesses. For just $8.33 a month, Phone Power offers unlimited calls within the US and Canada, plus a free hour of international calls. This Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) service works with your existing internet connection. Phone Power provides a free adapter that connects to your modem and lets you use two phones on a single line.

item.title: A Visual Guide To Enterprise VoIP Justification
item.description: Thank you to MegaPath Broadband Service Providers for this interesting infographic. Is your company missing out on the advantages of enterprise VoIP technology, which can potentially reduce costs and increase productivity? A variety of on-site and hosted options are available to accommodate businesses of all sizes. Explore business VoIP solutions and pricing from MegaPath and other providers.
